import{ImgApps}from"../../constant/images";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const IntroductionWeb=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"introductionWeb-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{fontWeight:"500",color:"black",fontFamily:"Montserrat"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{style:{color:"green"},children:"Tr\u1ECD Hub - n\u1EC1n t\u1EA3ng t\xECm Website cung c\u1EA5p nhi\u1EC1u t\xEDnh n\u0103ng ti\u1EC7n \xEDch h\u1ED7 tr\u1EE3 sinh vi\xEAn trong vi\u1EC7c t\xECm ki\u1EBFm ph\xF2ng tr\u1ECD m\u1ED9t c\xE1ch hi\u1EC7u qu\u1EA3 v\xE0 ti\u1EC7n l\u1EE3i."})," ","Giao di\u1EC7n t\xECm ki\u1EBFm th\xE2n thi\u1EC7n v\u1EDBi ng\u01B0\u1EDDi d\xF9ng, t\xEDch h\u1EE3p c\xE1c b\u1ED9 l\u1ECDc gi\xFAp sinh vi\xEAn d\u1EC5 d\xE0ng t\xECm ph\xF2ng tr\u1ECD theo ti\xEAu ch\xED nh\u01B0 gi\xE1 c\u1EA3 (1.500.000 VN\u0110 - 3.000.000 VN\u0110), di\u1EC7n t\xEDch (15m\xB2 - 50m\xB2), v\xE0 v\u1ECB tr\xED (g\u1EA7n tr\u01B0\u1EDDng h\u1ECDc). H\u1EC7 th\u1ED1ng qu\u1EA3n l\xFD n\u1ED9i dung (CMS) cho ph\xE9p ch\u1EE7 nh\xE0 t\u1EF1 \u0111\u0103ng t\u1EA3i, ch\u1EC9nh s\u1EEDa, ho\u1EB7c x\xF3a th\xF4ng tin v\u1EC1 ph\xF2ng tr\u1ECD, \u0111\u1ED3ng th\u1EDDi nh\u1EADn th\xF4ng b\xE1o khi c\xF3 tin nh\u1EAFn ho\u1EB7c \u0111\xE1nh gi\xE1 m\u1EDBi t\u1EEB ng\u01B0\u1EDDi d\xF9ng. Ch\u1EE9c n\u0103ng chat tr\u1EF1c tuy\u1EBFn gi\xFAp sinh vi\xEAn tr\xF2 chuy\u1EC7n tr\u1EF1c ti\u1EBFp v\u1EDBi ch\u1EE7 nh\xE0 \u0111\u1EC3 h\u1ECFi th\xEAm th\xF4ng tin, b\xEAn c\u1EA1nh s\u1EF1 h\u1ED7 tr\u1EE3 t\u1EEB chatbot tr\u1EA3 l\u1EDDi c\xE1c c\xE2u h\u1ECFi th\u01B0\u1EDDng g\u1EB7p. B\u1EA3n \u0111\u1ED3 t\u01B0\u01A1ng t\xE1c t\xEDch h\u1EE3p Google Maps hi\u1EC3n th\u1ECB v\u1ECB tr\xED ph\xF2ng tr\u1ECD v\xE0 c\xE1c ti\u1EC7n \xEDch xung quanh nh\u01B0 c\u1EEDa h\xE0ng t\u1EA1p h\xF3a, qu\xE1n \u0103n, hay \u0111i\u1EC3m giao th\xF4ng c\xF4ng c\u1ED9ng. H\u1EC7 th\u1ED1ng \u0111\xE1nh gi\xE1 cho ph\xE9p sinh vi\xEAn nh\u1EADn x\xE9t v\xE0 \u0111\xE1nh gi\xE1 ph\xF2ng tr\u1ECD c\u0169ng nh\u01B0 ch\u1EE7 nh\xE0, gi\xFAp ng\u01B0\u1EDDi d\xF9ng kh\xE1c tham kh\u1EA3o. Ngo\xE0i ra, ch\u01B0\u01A1ng tr\xECnh khuy\u1EBFn m\xE3i cung c\u1EA5p th\xF4ng b\xE1o v\u1EC1 c\xE1c \u01B0u \u0111\xE3i v\xE0 m\xE3 gi\u1EA3m gi\xE1 d\xE0nh ri\xEAng cho sinh vi\xEAn m\u1EDBi \u0111\u0103ng k\xFD t\xE0i kho\u1EA3n, k\xE8m th\xF4ng tin chi ti\u1EBFt v\xE0 \u0111i\u1EC1u ki\u1EC7n \xE1p d\u1EE5ng."]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"video-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:ImgApps.home1,alt:""})})]});};export default IntroductionWeb;
